typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{~id} as string,
		{titleType:String} as string,
		{primaryTitle:String} as string,
		{isAdult:Bool} as string,
		{startYear:String} as string,
		{endYear:String} as string,
		{runtimeMinutes:String} as string,
		{averageRating:Float} as string,
		{numVotes:Float} as string,
		{~label} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 exists({~id} == Column_1,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
